html:
1.29.21  9:49 am   What was with the large time gap between "Might quit" and "here comes the sun"

      i started to wonder what would happen if i did an entire music video in 3D from the start, instead of just using small bits of 3D. so i started the next video in 3D, and then a series of events began to unfold which changed my life for sure

1.29.21  9:12 am   the idea that we're all one person ultimately is pretty appealing, but I think some people take it too far, like the Human Instrumentality Project which wants to merge all consciousnesses into a single being, I think that's really scary and I'm not convinced it'd be a good thing

      i've heard the same thing about being born

1.29.21  8:52 am   wut is your next video going to be about

      wistfulness, listlessness, wishfulness,

1.29.21  8:38 am   How is progress on the song you're working on?  

     pretty good

     Have you started the music video part yet?

     yes

1.29.21  7:27 am   What is an orange?

      it's sort of like an apple

1.29.21  6:46 am   Im about to fail a math test. Any advice?

      just make sure you get all the answers wrong, and you should be all set

1.29.21  6:02 am   Thoughts on serialism?

      do it again!

1.29.21  6:01 am   what's your personal favorite type of music?

      normal

1.29.21  5:19 am   how do you make up your lyrics

      musically

1.29.21  5:06 am   you said you were working on a music video between april 2019 and june 2019. is this project scrapped or are you planning on continuing/publishing it later

      i'm doing it now

1.29.21  4:32 am   where do you get all those funky chord extensions?

      i do the melody first. then extend the chords underneath, as needed

1.29.21  1:48 am   How did you think of using 3D modeling for your most recent video?

      nowadays it's pretty much the only way i can do it

1.29.21  1:01 am   Do you ever get tired of the near-identical questions? (and am I contributing to it?)

      each one makes me stronger. but i will admit i am getting a little tired of how strong i'm getting

1.29.21  12:30 am   What do you do in your free time?

      my time is actually very expensive

1.29.21  12:26 am   why is the world stupid?

      due to intelligence

1.29.21  12:23 am   is your next song happy, sad, both, or neither?

      sad, and both

1.29.21  12:10 am   there's a chance i'm going to fail my statistics class should i sing about it

      sure. see if you can figure out the exact probability of failing

1.28.21  11:58 pm   thoughts on captital letters?

      they are a useful asset to any writer's tool kit

1.28.21  10:15 pm   In the video "hi i'm steve" steve says that is not his real name. What is steve's real name?

      could be the same as yours

1.28.21  10:12 pm   what time do I wash my cactus

      how about at the stroke of midnight

1.28.21  9:57 pm   Does it ever feel as if you're trying too hard to be you?

      no

1.28.21  9:41 pm   what's a particularly unorthodox time / place where / when the songwriting bug struck you?

      in the songwriting studio

1.28.21  8:58 pm   Can you release an another episode of "hi,im steve"?

     yes

     I always watch that video and it feels like everything's gonna be just fine.

1.28.21  8:08 pm   Do all of your songs/videos have inspiration behind them?

      yes

1.28.21  7:59 pm   Did you ever study music or such,

     i've been studying it all my life. every day, it seems

     the different techniques you use in your pieces are overwhelming! 

      my life is overwhelming, to be fair

1.28.21  7:38 pm   why do you think people think you never use capital letters?

      perhaps they are paying no attention whatsoever

1.28.21  5:45 pm   thoughts on rain

      somehow it reminds me of messenger particles. like those gauge bosons

1.28.21  5:28 pm   have you ever used more capital letters than lowercase letters in a sentence

      yes

1.28.21  5:24 pm   do you think it's better to make songs specifically for an album or just choose the best ones out of your unfinished ones?

      for each song, i try to choose the one that seems the best, considering the time period i'm currently in

1.28.21  5:09 pm   do you think your songs are stand-alone, like, without the music videos, like, would they be incomplete without them?

      they are complete as songs. incomplete as a music video (without the video)

1.28.21  5:06 pm   Bill, a while ago I asked you if you liked birds and you said no.

     i doubt that

      I went and checked all your music video clips and there is atleast one bird in all of them. Why did you lie to me Bill.

      i'm pretty sure you have lied about me lying to you

1.28.21  4:41 pm   what services does ohyeah corp offer

      decorum

1.28.21  4:13 pm   Do you predict the future it do you make it

      it's a collaborative effort

1.28.21  3:52 pm   why do you add jingles in some videos

      to possibly "influence" you

1.28.21  2:54 pm   whats your favorite time signature

      regular

1.28.21  2:28 pm   How's your mental state?

         it's pretty good

1.28.21  2:10 pm   why does the todo list grow so much faster than the done list? i don't like it.

      eventually you can always learn to do things faster. the universe knows this, so it is trying to make sure it can keep up

1.28.21  1:24 pm   how is might quit so magical

      it might be about you

1.28.21  12:58 pm   Why are your songs so meaningful?

      maybe they are about you

1.28.21  11:42 am   Tips on making music?

      the music will make you

1.28.21  11:17 am   Bill what are your thoughts on toast

      it's burnt bread, legalized

1.28.21  10:24 am   any tips for people who'd want to write songs and make music in the future?

      get a calendar, so you can figure out exactly when in the future you'd like to do it

1.28.21  10:07 am   what part of here comes the sun was written in 2020?

      everything after "no stranger to falling in love"

1.28.21  9:36 am   what is the purpose of your music?

      make the most of life and the living experience

1.28.21  8:56 am   what was the bad thing you did in "just did a bad thing"?

      failed at producing a song too quickly nor too slowly, and accidentally ended up working on it for exactly the right amount of time

1.28.21  8:43 am   Is there a meaning behind "at the airport terminal"? it sounds like a metaphor for something

      songs should be powerful enough to be a metaphor for anything

1.28.21  7:18 am   I like to make songs from time to time, But I just started to. Do you have any advice on making songs? Sorry if you get this question alot

      the good news is you can do anything you want. the bad news is you have to decide

1.28.21  6:59 am   where is old zealand

      in southwestern netherlands

1.28.21  6:45 am   how is the stick person climbing the building with the sun doing?

      pretty good

1.28.21  6:06 am   how do you come up with lyrics to sing

      i use the lyric/melody i would want to sing, if i could think of any lyric/melody to sing
